If you continue to attempt jailbreaking, it could lead to serious consequences such as data breaches, system crashes, or damage to your device, among other issues. I advise you to immediately cease such actions to avoid any potential loss or risk. Additionally, I recommend seeking professional technical support and advice to better manage and protect your devices and data.
